unnormalised: India scored 336/5 in the match against Pakistan, with Virat Kohli making 107 runs and Rohit Sharma contributing 62; Pakistan, however, was all out for 212 in 35.4 overs, giving India a massive victory of 124 runs.
normalised: India scored three hundred and thirty six for five in the match against Pakistan, with Virat Kohli making one hundred and seven runs and Rohit Sharma contributing sixty two; Pakistan, however, was all out for two hundred and twelve in thirty five point four overs, giving India a massive victory of one hundred and twenty four runs.
